SET[%s].description: Write: Set port  register Read: port output bits

SRAMBASE.description: SRAM address of the channel configuration table.

ENABLESET0.description: Channel Enable read and Set for all DMA channels.

ENABLECLR0.description: Channel Enable Clear for all DMA channels.

ACTIVE0.description: Channel Active status for all DMA channels.

BUSY0.description: Channel Busy status for all DMA channels.

ERRINT0.description: Error Interrupt status for all DMA channels.

INTENSET0.description: Interrupt Enable read and Set for all DMA channels.

INTENCLR0.description: Interrupt Enable Clear for all DMA channels.

INTA0.description: Interrupt A status for all DMA channels.

INTB0.description: Interrupt B status for all DMA channels.

SETVALID0.description: Set ValidPending control bits for all DMA channels.

SETTRIG0.description: Set Trigger control bits for all DMA channels.

ABORT0.description: Channel Abort control for all DMA channels.

CTLSTAT%s.description: Control and status register for DMA channel 0.

XFERCFG%s.description: Transfer configuration register for DMA channel 0.

EPLISTSTART.description: USB EP Command/Status List start address

OUTPUTDIRCTRL.description: SCT output counter direction control register

MATCH%s.description: SCT match value register of match channels 0 to 15; REGMOD0 to REGMODE15 = 0

FRACMAT%s.description: Fractional match registers 0 to 5 for SCT match value registers 0 to 5.

CAP%s.description: SCT capture register of capture channel 0 to 15; REGMOD0 to REGMODE15 = 1

MATCHREL%s.description: SCT match reload value register 0 to 15; REGMOD0 = 0 to REGMODE15 = 0

FRACMATREL%s.description: Fractional match reload registers 0 to 5 for SCT match value registers 0 to 5.

CAPCTRL%s.description: SCT capture control register 0 to 15; REGMOD0 = 1 to REGMODE15 = 1

OUTPUTDIRCTRL.description: SCT output counter direction control register

MATCH%s.description: SCT match value register of match channels 0 to 7; REGMOD0 to REGMODE7 = 0

CAP%s.description: SCT capture register of capture channel 0 to 7; REGMOD0 to REGMODE7 = 1

MATCHREL%s.description: SCT match reload value register 0 to 7; REGMOD0 = 0 to REGMODE7 = 0

CAPCTRL%s.description: SCT capture control register 0 to 7; REGMOD0 = 1 to REGMODE7 = 1

CTRL.description: A/D Control Register. Contains the clock divide value, enable bits for each sequence and the A/D power-down bit.

INSEL.description: A/D Input Select Register: Selects between external pin and internal source for various channels

SEQA_CTRL.description: A/D Conversion Sequence-A control Register: Controls triggering and channel selection for conversion sequence-A. Also specifies interrupt mode for sequence-A.

SEQB_CTRL.description: A/D Conversion Sequence-B Control Register: Controls triggering and channel selection for conversion sequence-B. Also specifies interrupt mode for sequence-B.

SEQA_GDAT.description: A/D Sequence-A Global Data Register. This register contains the result of the most recent A/D conversion performed under sequence-A

SEQB_GDAT.description: A/D Sequence-B Global Data Register. This register contains the result of the most recent A/D conversion performed under sequence-B

DAT[%s].description: A/D Channel 0 Data Register. This register contains the result of the most recent conversion completed on channel 0.

THR0_LOW.description: A/D Low Compare Threshold Register 0 : Contains the lower threshold level for automatic threshold comparison for any channels linked to threshold pair 0.

THR1_LOW.description: A/D Low Compare Threshold Register 1: Contains the lower threshold level for automatic threshold comparison for any channels linked to threshold pair 1.

THR0_HIGH.description: A/D High Compare Threshold Register 0: Contains the upper threshold level for automatic threshold comparison for any channels linked to threshold pair 0.

THR1_HIGH.description: A/D High Compare Threshold Register 1: Contains the upper threshold level for automatic threshold comparison for any channels linked to threshold pair 1.

CHAN_THRSEL.description: A/D Channel-Threshold Select Register. Specifies which set of threshold compare registers are to be used for each channel

INTEN.description: A/D Interrupt Enable Register. This register contains enable bits that enable the sequence-A, sequence-B, threshold compare and data overrun interrupts to be generated.

FLAGS.description: A/D Flags Register. Contains the four interrupt request flags and the individual component overrun and threshold-compare flags. (The overrun bits replicate information stored in the result registers).

VAL.description: D/A Converter Value Register. This register contains the digital value to be converted to analog.

CTRL.description: DAC Control register. This register contains bits to configure DAC operation and the interrupt/dma request flag.

CNTVAL.description: DAC Counter Value register. This register contains the reload value for the internal DAC DMA/Interrupt timer.

DMA_ITRIG_INMUX[%s].description: Trigger input for DMA channel 0 select register.

FREQMEAS_REF.description: Clock selection for frequency measurement function reference clock

FREQMEAS_TARGET.description: Clock selection for frequency measurement function target clock

MOD.description: Watchdog mode register. This register contains the basic mode and status of the Watchdog Timer.

TC.description: Watchdog timer constant register. This 24-bit register determines the time-out value.

FEED.description: Watchdog feed sequence register. Writing 0xAA followed by 0x55 to this register reloads the Watchdog timer with the value contained in WDTC.

TV.description: Watchdog timer value register. This 24-bit register reads out the current value of the Watchdog timer.

PINASSIGN0.description: Pin assign register 0. Assign movable functions U0_TXD, U0_RXD, U0_RTS, U0_CTS.

PINASSIGN1.description: Pin assign register 1. Assign movable functions U0_SCLK, U1_TXD, U1_RXD, U1_RTS.

PINASSIGN2.description: Pin assign register 2. Assign movable functions U1_CTS, U1_SCLK, U2_TXD, U2_RXD.

PINASSIGN3.description: Pin assign register 3. Assign movable function .

PINASSIGN4.description: Pin assign register 4. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN5.description: Pin assign register 5. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN6.description: Pin assign register 6. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN7.description: Pin assign register 7. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN8.description: Pin assign register 8. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN9.description: Pin assign register 9. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN10.description: Pin assign register 10. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN11.description: Pin assign register 11. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN12.description: Pin assign register 12. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN13.description: Pin assign register 13. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN14.description: Pin assign register 14. Assign movable functions

PINASSIGN15.description: Pin assign register 15. Assign movable functions

PINENABLE0.description: Pin enable register 0. Enables fixed-pin functions

PINENABLE1.description: Pin enable register 0. Enables fixed-pin functions

CFG.description: USART Configuration register. Basic USART configuration settings that typically are not changed during operation.

CTL.description: USART Control register. USART control settings that are more likely to change during operation.

STAT.description: USART Status register. The complete status value can be read here. Writing ones clears some bits in the register. Some bits can be cleared by writing a 1 to them.

INTENSET.description: Interrupt Enable read and Set register. Contains an individual interrupt enable bit for each potential USART interrupt. A complete value may be read from this register. Writing a 1 to any implemented bit position causes that bit to be set.

INTENCLR.description: Interrupt Enable Clear register. Allows clearing any combination of bits in the INTENSET register. Writing a 1 to any implemented bit position causes the corresponding bit to be cleared.

RXDAT.description: Receiver Data register. Contains the last character received.

RXDATSTAT.description: Receiver Data with Status register. Combines the last character received with the current USART receive status. Allows DMA or software to recover incoming data and status together.

TXDAT.description: Transmit Data register. Data to be transmitted is written here.

BRG.description: Baud Rate Generator register. 16-bit integer baud rate divisor value.

INTSTAT.description: Interrupt status register. Reflects interrupts that are currently enabled.

OSR.description: Oversample selection register for asynchronous communication.

ADDR.description: Address register for automatic address matching.

STAT.description: SPI Status. Some status flags can be cleared by writing a 1 to that bit position

INTENSET.description: SPI Interrupt Enable read and Set. A complete value may be read from this register. Writing a 1 to any implemented bit position causes that bit to be set.

INTENCLR.description: SPI Interrupt Enable Clear. Writing a 1 to any implemented bit position causes the corresponding bit in INTENSET to be cleared.

STAT.description: Status register for Master, Slave, and Monitor functions.

INTENSET.description: Interrupt Enable Set and read register.

CLKDIV.description: Clock pre-divider for the entire I2C block. This determines what time increments are used for the MSTTIME and SLVTIME registers.

INTSTAT.description: Interrupt Status register for Master, Slave, and Monitor functions.

MSTDAT.description: Combined Master receiver and transmitter data register.

SLVDAT.description: Combined Slave receiver and transmitter data register.

FILTERPHA.description: Digital filter register on input phase A (QEI_A)

FILTERPHB.description: Digital filter register on input phase B (QEI_B)

FILTERINX.description: Digital filter register on input index (QEI_IDX)

UARTCLKDIV.description: USART clock divider. Clock divider for the USART fractional baud rate generator.

IOCONCLKDIV.description: Peripheral clock to the IOCON block for programmable glitch filter

FRGCTRL.description: USART fractional baud rate generator control

PDAWAKECFG.description: Power-down states for wake-up from deep-sleep

INTVAL%s.description: MRT0 Time interval value register. This value is loaded into the TIMER0 register.

TIMER%s.description: MRT0 Timer register. This register reads the value of the down-counter.

CTRL%s.description: MRT0 Control register. This register controls the MRT0 modes.

IDLE_CH.description: Idle channel register. This register returns the number of the first idle channel.

IENR.description: Pin interrupt level or rising edge  interrupt enable register

SIENR.description: Pin interrupt level or rising edge  interrupt set register

CIENR.description: Pin interrupt level (rising edge interrupt) clear register

IENF.description: Pin interrupt active level or falling edge  interrupt enable register

SIENF.description: Pin interrupt active level or falling edge  interrupt set register

CIENF.description: Pin interrupt active level or falling edge  interrupt clear register

PMSRC.description: Pattern match interrupt bit-slice source register

PMCFG.description: Pattern match interrupt bit slice configuration register

PORT_POL[%s].description: GPIO grouped interrupt port 0 polarity register

PORT_ENA[%s].description: GPIO grouped interrupt port 0 enable register

COMPVAL.description: Compare value LSB register. Holds the 32 LSBs of the compare value.

MASK.description: Mask LSB register. This register holds the 32 LSB s of the mask value. A 1 written to any bit will force a compare on the corresponding bit of the counter and compare register.

COUNTER.description: Counter LSB register. 32 LSBs of the counter.

COMPVAL_H.description: Compare value MSB register. Holds the 16 MSBs of the compare value.

MASK_H.description: Mask MSB register. This register holds the 16 MSBs of the mask value. A 1 written to any bit will force a compare on the corresponding bit of the counter and compare register.

COUNTER_H.description: Counter MSB register. 16 MSBs of the counter.

SAMPLE_CTRL.description: SCT IPU sample control register. Contains the input mux selects,  latch/sample-enable mux selects, and sample overrride bits for the  SAMPLE module.

ABORT_ENABLE%s.description: SCT IPU abort enable  register: Selects which input source  contributes to ORed Abort Output 0.

ABORT_SOURCE%s.description: SCT IPU abort source  register: Status register indicating which input source caused abort output 0.

PIO0_%s.description: Digital I/O control for port 0 pins PIO0_25 to PIO0_31. With glitch filter.

PIO1_%s.description: Digital I/O control for port 1 pins PIO1_11 to PIO1_31. Without glitch filter.

PIO2_%s.description: Digital I/O control for port 2 pins PIO2_0 to PIO2_13. Without glitch filter.
